title: suspended for intentionally feeding but wasnt intentionally feeding.
body: sure my score-line wasnt the greatest, but i am a silver 2 player. im not a professional player. and i remember these two games clearly. my team was flaming me for "being bad". despite this i was tryng my best to catch up in these games to win. they all reported me and i let their negativity slide and didnt report them. and now i have a suspension for this? this isnt fair. i do have a toxic past but i am trying my best to reform my actions. please look furthur into this.

replies.body:
8 deaths between 15:45 and like 31:45
Death every ~2 minutes, some of them very very close to eachother, and almost all to Xin (on your wukong). Again, not saying you were feeding but it looks kinda interesting to say the least.

Edit: your Kai'sa game looks fine, so im leaning towards maybe just an error but... again without seeing a replay/chat its impossible to say.

Sometimes chat logs tell a different story, could have been winning, got angry, and started running it down mid. Which I've seen people do before.

Not saying you did that, but just trying to be objective about the evidence here. Which we don't have much. Have the replays? I'd like to watch them.

>but i am a silver 2 player

OP gg shows you being a silver 1.
must have been promoted recently and forgot sorry.

Nothing even remotely like inting in your history.

What was the _real_ reason you got banned?

>
> Nothing even remotely like inting in your history.
> 
> What was the _real_ reason you got banned?

Yeah; your last games weren't even actually even half as bad tbh they were pretty good 

https://imgur.com/a/74Gwo 


Send riot a support ticket because even scrolling deep down op.gg your kda's seem not int worthy. But then again you might be lying

Not even replying to the right person there..

idk i just really find it messed up that in both these instances these teams had isolated me, and talked down on me, yet because they all agree to report me im the one punished. and now i cant play my favorite game i spend most days on. sucks. and if u looked at both these games my kda isnt far off from any of my teammates.

https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2741380242/43309743?tab=overview
https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2746351173/43309743?tab=overview
these are the two games in question
They should have provided u with link to game in question
